message.content:
I need to identify the value of cash and cash equivalents at the end of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the section labeled "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which contains:
- Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
- Ending Balance: 2664809.03
- Net Increase: -5335190.97

The "Ending Balance" is the cash and cash equivalents at the end of the period, which is 2664809.03.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '2664809.03'}}
```
